name: Flick Hit Baseball: Home Run
description:
Want to play a baseball game! Want to hit a baseball out of park ? Flick hit baseball : Home Run is the ideal sports game to play.

Flick Hit Baseball : Home Run is an addictive game, where you can flick the ball using your finger to hit home run and travel farther and farther while improving your launch forces! How far can you go ?

Flick the ball as long as you can in this free baseball game, which is one of the best ball games.
Become a baseball star, by flicking the ball towards a long distance and farther out of this world to moon, by playing this new baseball game, which is one of the best free baseball games..

In this baseball game app, Beat your highest distance in this baseball game offline and flying ball game. Upgrade your power, Strength and ball bounciness, to flick the ball with great force in this baseball game, which is one of the top baseball games for kids and boy!

Get this baseball game! Hitting home run is never been so easy in this game.
